name: City of Lambs
storyline:
The City controlled by corporations.
Gangs rule the streets.
Police obeys cash.
Lambs are watching commercial dreams.
Choose your side...

Some people are nothing but lambs.
Others lead lives as wolves.
And some serve as shepherd dogs.
But you are exceptional.
You are going to be the only predator...
In the City of Lambs.
summary: City of Lambs is a science fiction themed turn-based strategy RPG.
